issue.title: sourceforge.net

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@FilteringDev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 16.2.3 to 16.2.4
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 16.2.3 to 16.2.4.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v16.2.4

Patch Changes

  • #1682 0176038 Thanks @​iiroj! - Update dependencies, including nano-spawn@2.0.0 with bug fixes.

  • #1671 581a54e Thanks @​iiroj! - Speed up execution by only importing the yaml depedency if using YAML configuration files.

Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

16.2.4

Patch Changes

  • #1682 0176038 Thanks @​iiroj! - Update dependencies, including nano-spawn@2.0.0 with bug fixes.

  • #1671 581a54e Thanks @​iiroj! - Speed up execution by only importing the yaml depedency if using YAML configuration files.

Commits
  • 122580b chore(changeset): release
  • 0176038 fix(deps): update dependencies
  • 581a54e perf: only import yaml when loading YAML files
  • See full diff in compare view

pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.38.0 to 0.39.0.
Changelog

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

0.39.0

  • Add MD060/table-column-style
  • Improve MD001/MD007/MD009/MD010/MD029/MD033/MD037/MD059
  • Add support for reporting violations as severity warning
  • Deprecate resultVersion and toString (breaking change)
  • Improve type definitions
  • Improve demo web page
  • Update dependencies
Commits
  • 29bd10d Update to version 0.39.0.
  • 333bb41 Remove unused/outdated internal parameter.
  • a94d1bf Bump nano-spawn from 1.0.3 to 2.0.0
  • 1af625f Bump eslint-plugin-jsdoc from 61.1.0 to 61.1.1
  • a55d549 Update MD009/no-trailing-spaces with code_blocks parameter to allow reporting...
  • 7beb9fc Address new TypeScript warnings in core files, improve type definitions.
  • bd02390 Bump eslint-plugin-jsdoc from 61.0.1 to 61.1.0
  • c72a54d Bump eslint-plugin-jsdoc from 61.0.0 to 61.0.1
  • 9db0735 Update test repository snapshots.

comment.body:
Fixed, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours (not for MV3 extension).

Unfortunately, MV3 extension cannot update filters due to Google policy, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.
Until then, please add following rules to user rules:
```adblock
newatlas.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-stack-trace', 'postMessage', 'onload')
newatlas.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'btoa', '/errorno|comoalmd-h\.lt|problem loading the page/')
newatlas.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-suppress-native-method', 'JSON.parse', '"html-load.com"')
```

I use not personal filters here, but without adguard I see cookie notification, I can agree or cancel and use this website normal, adguard blocks the text, but let not close cookie-notification and let not use this website normal. https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/214828#issuecomment-3392394377 not reproduced on my end. It's blocked by AdGuard Cookie Notices. Please leave only these fitlers for now, update them in 2-3 hours manually, clear browser data, restart the browser. Also do not post several comments with screenshots, you can do it in one and please hide them in the spoiler next time.
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard URL Tracking
AdGuard Cookie Notices
AdGuard Popups
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
AdGuard Other Annoyances
AdGuard Widgets
AdGuard German
```

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: sourceforge.net

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@FilteringDev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body: Probably old filters. Not reproduced with 5.2.112.24 Beta.

Safari

issue.title: AdGuard for Safari cant block cookie popups on some sites
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Safari

### AdGuard version

1.11.24

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.thelab.gr and https://www.macworld.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

Greek AdBlock Filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


with all the above enabled the filters cant work on those sites:

https://www.thelab.gr
https://www.macworld.com

the only workaround is to manual add custom filter from easylist: EasyList Cookie List
and works.

please can you see whats going on? this happend as long i remember on safari extension.
adguard for mac works without issue.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: another find, is that when i disable the adguard tracking protection https://appleinsider.com/ start to show cookie popups and the rest sites seams to work without the custon easylist cookie filter, something weird is going on.....cause when i enable the tracking protection filter the site hides the cookie popups...doent make sense
